features: 2023 Upgraded Super Sturdy Legs for Toddler Toys: bravokids magnetic drawing board adopt the newest and most sturdy 5.9inch detachable legs with spiral groove, which hold enough to hold up to 120 lbs without any risk of breaking and can be used as both a drawing board or a small seat, much more stable than 4.9inch snap-on hollow and flimsy legs in the market

Safety Toys for Your Baby: bravokids magnet drawing board has Children's Product Certificate, which is non-toxic, safe, BPA-free and environmentally friendly. Rounded edges, soft curves and sealed back are soft to touch and won't hurt your kids' delicate hands. While you're cleaning or cooking, you can use the drawing tablet to keep your baby busy and happy without worry

Doodle Board with Newest Designs: The pen ergonomic with round pen tip is more comfortable for kids to hold and draw. The silicone pen holder is easy to take out and put in. The pen rope effectively prevents the pen from being lost, and is also suitable for left-handed kids. The special silicone handle on the back of drawing board is more comfortable and convenient for your kids to pick up

Colorful Magnetic Drawing Board with Piano Look: bravokids magnetic doodle board displays 4 colors (Red, Yellow, Blue, Green) with a piano look for a visual treat for your kids, which could trigger your child’s interest, stimulates his curiosity towards colors, make your kids draw as they want, make their drawing more vivid and satisfy their different need for painting

Easy to Erase: bravokids magnet drawing tablet adopts the upgraded erasing structure, which makes erasing more effortless and smoother, even your kids can easily erase. Compared with the traditional paper drawing method, there is no oil stain on the clothes while drawing, which is very suitable for your kids to draw, write, count, spell numbers and ABC on the magnet drawing board to stimulate their creativity and imagination

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: bravokids Magnetic Drawing Board: Happy Playing & Learning Toddler Toys for 1-2 Year Old Girls Boys -- Stocking stuffers Upgraded 5.9inch Thread Mounted Solid Legs: Strong Load-bearing up to 120LB bravokids always aim to provide you and your children with the best products, received unanimous praise from more than 1.5 million shoppers since 2017 After a lot of market research and feedback collection, we found several problems with the magnetic drawing board on the market, such as: thin and fragil legs, sharp edges and corners, small drawing screen with the unpaintable edge. We developed and produced a new type of magnetic drawing board, which effectively solved these issues. Other Legs: Snap-on legs in the market is just holds 20lb weight, very flimsy.bravokids Legs: Spiral groovel legs is holds up to 120lb without any risk of breaking and can be used as both a drawing board or a small seat. Installation Method: Align the direction of the spiral groove on the leg with the direction on the artboard to install.Turn the legs of the doodle board clockwise until tightly fixed.

Key Features of bravokids Magnetic Drawing Board Sealed Back: Come with sturdy frame with sealed back protect kids from scratch harm, compared to other unsealed drawing board.Rounded Corner: Be more comfortable to hold and won't hurt your kid's delicate hands.Smoother Erasing Function: Designed with upgraded erase structure, let your kids erase the doodle board more effortless and smoother.Soft Silicone Handle: Let your kids more comfortable and convenient hold and carry on the toys to any occasions.Soft Silicone Pen Holder: Let your kids easily take out and put in the pen of the toddler toys, and touch it without hurting their hands.

Safe Metarial The baby toys was made by high-quality ABS material, which is BPA-free, non-toxic and durable, which complies Federal Safety Standards & Children's Product Certificatefor for toddlers 12 month+, and no choking hazard stamps. Full Crash Protection The drawing board adopt rounded corner and sealed back, which is safe for children to hold and won't hurt their delicate hands, compared to the drawing board with unsealed bakc, sharp edges and corners in the market. 8.7inch Fully Usable Large Screen 8.7inch Fully Usable Large Screen Size let your child draw what they want on the doodle board and capture all your child's strokes, compared to 8.3inch small screen size with the unpaintable edge in the market.

Multi-used Drawing Board Portable Size: bravokids magnetic drawing tablet for kids comes with 13.1 x 10.7inch portable travel size, which can be taken on car, train, boat, and plane journeys.A Great Helper for You: bravokids drawing board is a great sensory toys, which can quiet your kids down right away and keep them busy for some time, and won’t create a mess on your carpet or your house the way paints might.Learning Toys: bravokids toddler toys is a perfect interactive toys for drawing, note-taking, memo, reminding, leaving a message, draft and scrawl to inspire your kid's creativity and show you their interesting imagination.
